hadiths.text: Abu Hurairah reported the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) as saying; when you come to pray while we are prostrating ourselves, you must prostrate yourselves, and do not reckon it anything (rak’ah) he has been present at the prayer

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي الرَّجُلِ يُدْرِكُ الإِمَامَ سَاجِدًا كَيْفَ يَصْنَعُ
chapter.eng-name: What Should One Who Finds The Imam In Prostration Do ?
